entry.title: My Letting Fees
entry.summary: Very soft launch of My Letting Fees - a letting fee comparison site built with Generation Rent. I'll write more as more agents are added and we can start doing cool things with the stats.

entry.title: Meet The Robots
entry.summary:
Inkleby is about doing publishing of "big" things better on the web. What that actually means in practice will become clearer as projects roll out over the next few months.

In the meantime meet the adorable Inkleby Robots. They make #content.
